title: Vel'koz Life Bar / Character Model Bug STILL
body:
Why is Vel'koz's life bar half the screen above his character model? It's been that way ever since the champion was created. Is this seriously something that just can't be fixed?

That champion ruins every ARAM he's in because of this BS.

replies.body:
Hey Shyft4!

I loaded up Vel'Koz, both on Summoner's Rift, and on Howling Abyss, and his health bar doesn't appear to be terribly high. 

In Vel'Koz's case, his tentacles move around quite a bit, and at some points, the health bar may appear higher than it usually does based on the location of the tentacles.
